snippet: Tirico, who called “Monday Night Football,” will have a more diverse role at NBC Sports, including Olympic work. McDonough is moving up from college football.
abstract: ESPN promotes Sean McDonough to Monday Night Football, replacing Mike Tirico, who is leaving to join NBC Sports.
lead_paragraph: Tirico, who called “Monday Night Football,” will have a more diverse role at NBC Sports, including Olympic work. McDonough is moving up from college football.

headline.main: Mike Tirico Will Join NBC; ESPN Names Sean McDonough His ‘Monday Night Football’ Replacement
headline.print_headline: Tirico to Join NBC, Leaving Mondays to Sean McDonough
